item.title: The grim GUI landscape
item.description: I’d like to think I’ve spent long enough in desktop GUI development. I’m disappointed by what I’ve seen as I’ve worked with a vast palette of desktop GUI solutions. Everything from Qt to Electron have their own hideous limbs with their very own creative ways burden you as you develop your app. That isn’t to discredit them all, as a few actually offer wonderful developer experiences (though often still lacking in practicality and applicability).
